definition: (coll.) leading light/superstar/badass/(coll.) higher-priced model of Lamborghini
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome

sentences.english: Of all the pagodas I've seen, this one has the most beautiful relief carvings.
sentences.chinese: 在我大牛看過的塔裏面就屬它的磚雕最精美。

sentences.english: Daniel, beneath that Buddha statue is the Dazangwang Hall.
sentences.chinese: 大牛，那佛像的下面就是地藏王大殿了。

sentences.english: Daniel, do you want to know what's written in the Book of Changes?
sentences.chinese: 大牛，你想不想看看《周易》裏面都寫了些什麼啊？

sentences.english: Daniel, how many fish have you caught?
Daniel and I are going to join the Guozhuang dance there.
sentences.chinese: 我跟大牛又要加入到鍋莊的隊伍當中去了。

sentences.english: Daniel, why are you running about alone?
sentences.chinese: 大牛，你怎麼自己到處亂跑啊？

sentences.english: Daniel, you are quite good at camel riding.
sentences.chinese: 大牛，你這駱駝騎得還挺好。

sentences.english: Dear viewer friends, Daniel's gone to climb the pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 觀衆朋友們，大牛去爬文峯塔了。

sentences.english: Daniel, the Yi Gate Tower can be regarded as Longmen's landmark structure.
sentences.chinese: 大牛，這義門可以說是龍門鎮的標誌性建築了。

sentences.english: Hey, Daniel, is this your lunch?
Daniel, that place is at Yunshanping.
sentences.chinese: 大牛，你說的地方就在這雲杉坪了。

sentences.english: What are you gesturing about with him?
sentences.chinese: 大牛，你們倆還在比畫什麼呢？

sentences.english: I found the Chen family was as learned as I am.
sentences.chinese: 發現了這陳家人跟我大牛一樣有學問。

sentences.english: All of the characteristics show that the Daniudi is a typical compound gas field.
sentences.chinese: 各種的地質特徵表明大牛氣田爲一典型的複式氣田。

sentences.english: Daniel, how do you think of the forest of steles?
sentences.chinese: 大牛，你覺得碑林怎麼樣啊？

sentences.english: Of course, ni Ping is right " big ox " good risible expression special love.
sentences.chinese: 當然，倪萍對“大牛”又乖又愛笑的表現非常喜愛。

definition: (slang) novice/greenhorn/fool/idiot/abbr. for 小白臉|小白脸[xiao3 bai2 lian3], pretty boy
ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
hegemon/tyrant/lord/feudal chief/to rule by force/to usurp/(in modern advertising) master
old age/very/eldest child in a family/leader of a group/boss/captain of a boat/leader of a criminal gang
